item.description:
NEW STUFF:
The movie starts at 7:15. So let's meet by 6:50 and head in at 7:00. This is a BIT later than the original time, so if it changes any of your plans, feel free to RSVP until about 4:00 tomorrow. After that, give my cell a ring if you wanna come. (508-308-4897). See you tomorrow!

OLD STUFF:
It's about time for a chick flick. (That's not to say that you men aren't welcome or appreciated, too. So don't be shy if you wanna see it!) Let's go to The Women. I hear it's a cute little film.

The show starts at 6:25 on Wednesday evening, so let's meet outside the theater by 6:10. Call me if you're gonna be late so I can wait for you.

Sorry for the short notice, but I wanna go out this Wednesday. :-)

After, we'll go to TGI Fridays and discuss.

Guests, as always, are welcome. Just be sure to include them in the RSVP so I know how many people to expect.

Again, as always, discounted tickets for my Framingham Movie Meetup friends is $8.50. And I also have discounted small popcorn and small drink tickets ($3 each).

My cell for last-minute RSVPs or "I'm lost" calls: 508-308-4897.

See you Wednesday!

--Dana
item.name: The Women
